channel.title: Homes on Open Plant Pathology
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Open Plant Pathology

item.description: What is Open Plant Pathology? A community of modelers and computational researchers involved in plant pathology, plant disease epidemiology, pathogen population biology, microbial ecology and genomics, that supports the several forms of Open Science practices in Plant Pathology. We support efforts from individuals or groups to develop and deliver next-generation databases and tools for plant pathology-related subjects and applications using open source software, data and repositories. Know our Vision and Mission and request to join

A Growing Global Community! Check detailed information about the members, institutions, knowledge domains and the global map of Open Plant Pathology Knowledge domains General Plant Pathology, Epidemiology, Geophytopathology, Modeling, Population Biology, Genomics, Microbial Ecology, Programming, Embedded Systems. CLICK HERE TO ACCESS THE DIRECTORY
